Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")]

summary.span: 提供用于显示日历的控件功能。

span.span: Provides control capability to display a calendar.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日历显示按天、周或月显示。The calendar display is by day, week, or month. 是否在移动设备上呈现整月取决于设备的功能。Whether an entire month is rendered on a mobile device depends on the capabilities of the device. 通常，该 控件允许选择日期。In general, the control permits the selection of a date. 移动 控件包装 Web 窗体 控件。The mobile control wraps a Web Forms control. 尽管移动 控件模仿基础控件的某些属性、方法和事件，但它不公开特定于 HTML 呈现的其他属性。Although the mobile control mimics some properties, methods, and events of the underlying control, it does not expose other properties specific to HTML rendering. 若要对其进行修改，可以通过属性访问基础控件 并直接修改设置。To modify these, you can access the underlying control through the property and modify the settings directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 页面加载代码块中的属性如何允许用户选择一天、一周或几个月的时间段。The following code example shows how the property in the page load code block allows the user to select a day, a week, or a month block of time. 此示例设置 类的和 属性 以区分用户选择。This example sets the and properties of the class to distinguish the user selection. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `null` ，则默认值为本地化字符串 (例如，"Calendar" ) 。When this property is set to `null`, the default is the localized string (for example, "Calendar"). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性设置向用户显示的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the text that is displayed to the user. 此示例是概述的更大代码示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET API 中， 枚举包含一周中的每一天，默认值返回该服务器的第一周的本地设置。In the ASP.NET API, the enumeration contains every day of the week, with the default value returning the server's local setting for the first day of the week. 此属性的工作方式与属性相同 。This property functions the same way as the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户通过单击日期选择器控件选择一天、一周或整月时，将引发事件。The event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 当在 派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法， 以便注册的委托接收事件。When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 ASP.NET 在内部调用。This method is called internally by ASP.NET. 它提供一个包装，以便 在用户选择日期时引发事件。It provides a wrapper to raise the event when a date is selected by the user. 与 方法不同，此方法是公共的，可由不同的适配器在收集选定日期时调用。Unlike the method, this method is public and can be called by different adapters when they have collected the selected date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，将此属性与属性一起使用， 以确定控件的所选日期 。Typically, you use this property together with the property to determine the selected date of a control. 为此，请将 属性设置为 -此设置仅允许从控件中选择一个日期 。To do this, set the property to - this setting allows only a single date selection from the control. 浏览到下一个月或上个月将不会更新此属性。Browsing to the next or previous month will not update this property. 此属性具有与 ASP.NET 属性相同的功能 。This property has the same functionality as the ASP.NET property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来引用所选日期。The following code example demonstrates how to the use the property to refer to the selected day. 此示例是概述的更大代码示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 窗体 枚举提供下表中所述的选择。The Web Forms enumeration provides the selections described in the following table. |ValueValue|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||可以在 控件上选择单个日期。A single date can be selected on the control.| ||可以在 控件上选择单日或整周。A single date or entire week can be selected on the control.| ||可以在 控件上选择单个日期、周或整月。A single date, week, or entire month can be selected on the control.| ||在 控件上不能选择任何日期。No dates can be selected on the control. **注意：** 避免使用此值，因为某些浏览器仍允许用户选择日期。**Note:** Avoid using this value, because some browsers still allow the user to select a date.|

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件后，会更新属性 。The property is updated after the event is raised. 日期可以是该月中的任意一天。The date can be any day within the month. 仅使用对象的月份值 。Only the month value of the object is used. 此属性具有与 Web 窗体属性相同的功能 。This property has the same functionality as the Web Forms property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性设置日历中的可见日期。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the visible dates on the calendar. 此示例是概述的更大代码示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. summary.span: 获取基础 Web 窗体 控件。

span.span: Gets the underlying Web Forms control.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 移动控件不会复制 移动设备上不支持的 ASP.NET Web 窗体控件的属性。The ASP.NET mobile controls do not duplicate the properties of the ASP.NET Web Forms control that are not supported on mobile devices. 因此，如果想要使用可用于基础控件的功能 ，则可以通过属性访问对象来实现此目的 。Thus, if you want to use features that are available for the underlying control, you do so by accessing the object through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性应用仅在基础控件中可用的格式设置 。The following code example uses the property to apply formatting that is only available in the underlying control. 此示例是概述的更大代码示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)] [!code-vb[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)]
